snippet: Former Representative Gabrielle Giffords and her husband unveiled a campaign against gun violence on the second anniversary of the shooting that killed six people and left Ms. Giffords critically injured.
abstract: Former Arizona Rep Gabrielle Giffords and her husband, Mark E Kelly, unveil campaign against gun violence on the second anniversary of the Tuscon shooting.
lead_paragraph: Former Representative Gabrielle Giffords and her husband unveiled a campaign against gun violence on the second anniversary of the shooting that killed six people and left Ms. Giffords critically injured.

headline.main: Arizona: Giffords and Husband Start Campaign Against Gun Violence
headline.print_headline:
Arizona: Giffords and Husband Start
Campaign Against Gun Violence
